content: Anyone have an under desk cable management tray, box, or shelf they recommend? Can be drilled or clamped. My desk is 72" long for reference.

My OmniDesk came with one of these: https://theomnidesk.com.au/collections/ecosystem/products/advanced-cable-management-bar-black

And there are loads of solutions you can 3D print, too
I'm considering this one https://www.amazon.com/Under-Cable-Management-Organizers-Organizer/dp/B09L62NFJ2?ref_=ast_sto_dp plus zip ties

Al Gonzalez said:

I'm considering this one https://www.amazon.com/Under-Cable-Management-Organizers-Organizer/dp/B09L62NFJ2?ref_=ast_sto_dp plus zip ties

Funny you link this. I have this on my Amazon list because it's cheap enough and seemingly designed well enough for my use case. Perhaps I'll just start here until I form a better opinion after use.
If you have a 3D printer you could print some Underware (SFW, I promise) https://makerworld.com/en/models/783010-underware-2-0-infinite-cable-management?from=search#profileId-808979
I don't have one but I'd like to see how strong those are. I tend to be a brute with things.
